text: National Route 75 is a national highway in South Korea connects Gapyeong County to Hwacheon County. It was established on 25 August 2001.대통령령 제17348호 일반국도노선지정령, 2001년 8월 25일 전부개정. ==Main stopovers== ; Gyeonggi Province * Gapyeong County ; Gangwon Province * Hwacheon County ==Major Intersections== * (■): Motorway IS: Intersection, IC: Interchange ===Gyeonggi Province=== Yudong IS {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;" |- !
